drupalNodeEvent.title: Meaningful Ageing Roundtable: Session 1 - Meaningful Living and Dying in a Chinese Context

field_speakers.processed: Speaker information is available on the event page.

field_organizers.processed: Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health - China Health Partnership, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies

drupalNodeEvent.field_event_language: English (one-directional English to Chinese simultaneous interpretation will be provided through Zoom)

field_description.processed:
This event seeks to develop new and innovative ideas to help China develop a health and eldercare system to meet the needs of its ageing population in light of demographic shifts. Over multiple sessions, we will assemble an interdisciplinary group of experts to share their ideas, research and practical experience that could be adapted to the Chinese cultural, social and institutional contexts. The Roundtable includes two sessions; the full program agenda is available on the event page:

Session 1 - Meaningful Living and Dying in a Chinese Context
Monday, June 21, 8:30 - 10:30pm EDT - in the *evening*
北京时间6月22日（周二）上午8点半至10点半;

Session 2 - Innovative Eldercare Models
Monday, June 22, 8:30 - 10:30am EDT - in the *morning*
北京时间6月22日（周二）晚上8点半至10点半
